description:
A statue falls in love and goes to visit its lover every night.  A trickster fox loves to tease an old man, but one night it goes a little too far.  An owl dies a crow different colors, but the crow doesn`t like them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi Suru Jizou-sama / Itazura Gitsune no Pechanko Bana / Fukurou Kon`ya
The Priest Statue Falls in Love / The Flat Nose of the Trickster Fox / A Room with an Owl
恋する地蔵さま / いたずら狐のぺちゃんこ鼻 / ふくろう紺屋
